Hi all

(I have searched to see if anyone else had had this problem)

Reactors on various craft are suffering from Reactor Health loss even when the reactors are switched off. I have adequate radiators installed and working but the reactors still start to die. One ship, went from 100% to 0% health just by fast forwarding the game a few hours.

Has anyone else experienced this?
I have just found an answer to this in the Near Future Tech thread, how do I delete this post???
